title: Summary
body: I have been interested in web technologies for long, but I have been treated it as a hobby.  After many occupations I worked in I realised that only programming is worth exploring.  The more I learn about coding the more fascinating it becomes for me. Therefore I decided to turn my interest into profession and run for a career as a developer.
Below you will find projects I have completed that demonstrate my skills and background in developing.

title: Education and courses
body: Stanislaw Stasic University of Arts & Sciences in Kielce, Poland. Majoring in Computer Graphics.
KODILLA - Programing Shool. Online Bootcamp. Front-End Developer.
Greenlands Business Centre, Redditch. OCR Functional Skills qualification in English at Level 2.
Heart of Worcester College, Redditch. Edexcel Level 1 in ESOL Skills for Life
